sentence: ? GA-Gov: Former Sen. David Perdue is continuing his all-Trump all-the-time advertising strategy for the May GOP primary with a new commercial that uses footage of Trump bashing both incumbent Brian Kemp and Democrat Stacey Abrams at his Saturday rally.
title: Morning Digest: Tennessee GOP's bill would block Trump's pick, but they'll need courts to agree
